transcript:
Customer: Hello. Hello?
Executive: Haan madam boliye.
Customer: Thank you. Good morning, ma'am. Good afternoon.
Executive: Haan madam, very, very good. Haan boliye boliye.
Customer: Main hello baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Kyunki us din aaj subah subah unhone message kiya tha bilkul main abhi aayi hu usko meeting thi mere abhi maine call kiya phir abhi free hui hu toh.
Executive: Abhi sir sir sir ka call aaya tha aapke hi colleague ho gaye na?
Customer: Meri side se call aayi thi aapke paas.
Executive: Haan aapka discount aapka bhi toh naam bola tha. Haan haan discount sir ne wohi bola ki discount ka fix kijiye pehle phir sir payment karenge.
Customer: Achcha achcha achcha woh haan main approval lena padta hai na humein.
Customer: Toh maine share kiya tha shayad kiya ho sir ne pata nahi mujhe koi idea nahi hai uske baare mein.
Executive: Okay. Toh aapke saath baat ho rahi hai madam aur aap aaj sir payment karne wale hai aur lekin sir ne bola hai ki kuch discount ke baare mein baat hui thi sir se toh sir ka yeh kehna hai ki aap discount ka fix toh ek baar main sir se baat kar lu.
Customer: Sir se main baat karu.
Executive: Toh abhi sir ka kehna hai ki thoda hello.
Customer: Haanji madam bataiye.
Executive: Hello. Haan. Toh sir abhi thoda busy hai. Haan haan hello madam aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Mujhe aapki aawaz aa rahi hai. Ji bataiye.
Executive: Okay. Sir abhi thoda busy hai toh madam sir call karenge aapko. Okay?
Customer: Achcha theek hai aur yeh madam puchni thi ki is time service vagerah toh sahi chal rahi hai na?
Executive: Madam abhi toh abhi kal aaj toh nahi hai na madam kuch bhi nahi hai.
Customer: Aaj lead nahi hai ya phir calling query nahi aayi hai aapke paas?
Customer: Calling mein mujhe yeh puchna tha ki itna itna zyada jo calls apne hai woh itna zyada miss kyun ho raha hai? Matlab traffic call aayi thi 35 call aayi thi.
Customer: Toh aapne kaafi zyada call miss kari hui hai last month mein problem hui thi.
Executive: Haan haan woh thoda work ki wajah se miss hoti hai ma'am lekin karte hai madam usme hum call karte hai na ma'am.
Customer: Call back karti hai aap?
Executive: Haan yeh abhi thoda hua tha thoda busy schedule tha iski wajah se lekin abhi jo work chalu hoga woh madam detail mein ho jayega pura.
Customer: Mujhe yeh bolti hu nahi hogi madam.
Customer: Achcha do number pe aate honge na call yeh last mein 123 hai aur ek 160 hai in dono number pe aate honge na jab bhi IndiaMART bank call aata hoga toh.
Executive: Haan madam haan.
Customer: Toh madam aur koi number hai ya aap hi dono use karte ho aap aur sir aap hi dono log use karte ho.
Executive: Haan madam aur sir se toh hum haan. Madam yeh toh.
Customer: Nahi nahi jaise koi aur bhi ho.
Executive: Abhi toh nahi hai madam shayad lekin sir karne wale hai usme add.
Customer: Achcha sir karne wale hai usme add.
Executive: Haan haan woh jab aapka jo payment ho jayega na uske baad mein sir karenge add. Abhi toh nahi hai koi dusra number.
Customer: Theek hai next vagerah mein add karenge achcha.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai madam tab tak suniye na sir haan haan madam aap karo call aap mujhe three ke baad mein call karo madam. 3 baje ke baad mein call kijiye.
Customer: Chaliye theek hai do se teen toh hamara bhi lunch hota hai main bhi 3 baje ke baad hi karti hu aapko.
Executive: Chalega chalega madam chalega.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay. Okay madam theek hai thank you. Okay okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants discount fixed before payment.

- Enquires about service status.

- Asks about missed calls and call volume.

- Enquires about the calling number used.



Resolution:

- Executive assured call back for missed calls.

- Executive confirmed services are running smoothly.

- Executive confirmed about calling numbers.

- Executive informed sir will call back.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back after 3 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- discount, payment, missed calls, calling number
